column4: Ok this is a silly question. I am running on the eee 1000 HD and I unwittingly chose to upgrade then partial upgraded for the beta. Now I have a screen saying something about the plymoth splash screen error codes and then sends me to essentially xserver waiting for a log in. Now though through a number of commands. It looks to be running in the Terminal with color, Any ideas?
That's a channel for help with the next release of ubuntu.  Assuming that's what you mean by beta, was 10.04/lucid
